sentence: And I’m working with [Rep.] Jim Jordan from the Judiciary Committee on draft legislation that would remove those Section 230 provisions for the larger companies and hold them accountable for a new set of rules, while protecting those liability protections for the smaller startups, the new innovators, the Parlers, the Gettr, the Truth media of the future.
